title: With all the growth in Brunswick County; and all the new roads improvements that are coming. Has the DOT looked at ways to improve traffic coming out of Wilmington, on HWY 421, to Leland and merging into 74/76/17. The 5:00 traffic on this road is awful. It can take 30 minutes to travel the distance from the Cape Fear River to 74/76/17.
text:
This recent story should answer your question:
